name: The Magical Item #16: Ersom: The Manga Studio
description: Dino won the challenge in Nar and was granted access to the temple. He entered the temple with Jaru, walked down a long hall and found a book with a pen. As soon as he held the pen, he was transported to Ersom, the 16th Magical Location. He found himself on a Boatpen floating in the Inklake. In the center of this city is Bei, an ancient manga artist. All his life, he has been illustrating the journeys of the characters in this Magical World. Every character had a series of manga books showcasing their life and drawn by Bei. Bei feels a strange and strong energy, he looks around and is surprised to see a new face, a person that he hasn't met yet: Dino. He then decides to create the manga of Dino. The details of this series will be released separately. Unlocking this portal will increase your Drawing Power by 800 MPs and grant you the first two Manga Covers of Bei's Series.
